Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
EATING QUESTIONNAIRE
Instructions: The following questions are concerned with the past four weeks (28 days) only. Please read each question carefully. Please answer all the questions. Thank you.
Questions 1 to 12: Please choose the appropriate number on the right. Remember that the questions only refer to the past four weeks (28 days) only.
On how many of the past 28 days.....
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Have you been deliberately trying to limit the amount of food you eat to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 2. Have you gone for long periods of time (8 waking hours or more) without eating anything at all in order to influence your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Have you tried to exclude from your diet any foods that you like in order to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 4. Have you <u>tried</u> to follow definite rules regarding your eating (for example, a calorie limit) in order to influence your shape or weight (whether or not you have succeeded)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 5. Have you had a definite desire to have any <u>empty</u> stomach with the aim of influencing your shape or weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 6. Have you had a definite desire to have a totally flat stomach?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Has thinking about <u>food, eating or calories</u> made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (for example, working, following a conversation, or reading)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 8. Has thinking about <u>shape or weight</u> made it very difficult to concentrate on things you are interested in (for example, working, following a conversation, or reading)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 9. Have you had a definite fear of losing control over eating?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 10. Have you had a definite fear that you might gain weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 11. Have you felt fat?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel: 12. Have you had a strong desire to lose weight?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Questions 13-18: Please fill in the appropriate number in the boxes on the right. Remember that the questions only refer to the past four weeks (28 days).<br. Over the past four weeks (28 days)...
Field.ElementLabel: 13. Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you eaten what other people would regard as an <u>unusually large amount of food</u> (given the circumstances)?
14. On how many of these times did you have a sense of having lost control over your eating (at the time that you were eating)?

15. Over the past 28 days, on how many <u>DAYS</u> have such episodes of overeating occurred (i.e., you have eaten an unusually large amount of food <u>and</u> have had a sense of loss of control at the time)?
16. Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you made yourself sick (vomit) as a means of controlling your shape or weight?
17. Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you taken laxatives as a means of controlling your shape or weight?
18. Over the past 28 days, how many <u>times</u> have you exercised in a "driven" or "compulsive" way as a means of controlling your weight, shape or amount of fat, or to burn off calories?

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Questions 19 to 21: Please choose the appropriate number. <u>Please note that for these questions the term "binge eating" means</u> eating what others would regard as an unusually large amount of food for the circumstances, accompanied by a sense of having lost control over eating.
Field.ElementLabel:
19. Over the past 28 days, on how many days have you eaten in secret (ie, furtively)?
...Do not count episodes of binge eating

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - No Days 
 1, 1 - 1-5 days 
 2, 2 - 6-12 days 
 3, 3 - 13-15 days 
 4, 4 - 16-22 days 
 5, 5 - 23-27 days 
 6, 6 - Every Day

Field.ElementLabel:
20. On what proportion of the times that you have eaten have you felt guilty (felt that you've done wrong) because of its effect on your shape or weight?
...Do not count episodes of binge eating

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - None of the times 
 1, 1 - A few of the times 
 2, 2 - Less than half 
 3, 3 - Half of the times 
 4, 4 - More than half 
 5, 5 - Most of the time 
 6, 6 - Every time

Field.ElementLabel:
21. Over the past 28 days, how concerned have you been about other people seeing you eat?
...Do not count episodes of binge eating

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader: Questions 22 to 28: Please choose the appropriate number on the right. Remember that the questions only refer to the past four weeks (28 days).
Field.ElementLabel: 22. Has your <u>weight</u> influenced how you think about (judge) yourself as a person?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 23. Has your <u>shape</u> influenced how you think about (judge) yourself as a person??

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 24. How much would it have upset you if you had been asked to weigh yourself once a week (no more, or less, often) for the next four weeks?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 25. How dissatisfied have you been with your <u>weight</u>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 26. How dissatisfied have you been with your <u>shape</u>?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 27. How unconmfortable have you felt seeing your body (for example, seeing your shape in the mirror, in a shop window reflection, while undressing or taking a bath or shower)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: 28. How uncomfortable have you felt about <u>others</u> seeing your shape or figure (for example, in communal changing rooms, when swimming, or wearing tight clothes)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, 0 - Not at all 
 1, 1 
 2, 2 - Slightly 
 3, 3 
 4, 4 - Moderately 
 5, 5 
 6, 6 - Markedly

Field.ElementLabel: What is your weight at present? (please give your best estimate.)
What is your height? (Please give your best estimate.)
If female: Over the past three-to-four months have you missed any mentrual periods?
If so, how many?
Have you been taking the "pill"?
